title: Prudential to buy online startup Assurance IQ for $2.35 billion: WSJ
text:
Prudential to buy online startup Assurance IQ for $2.35 billion: WSJ

Technology 14 minutes ago (Sep 05, 2019 06:21AM ET)

© Reuters. Prudential to buy online startup Assurance IQ for $2.35 billion: WSJ (Reuters) - Prudential Financial Inc (NYSE: ) has agreed to acquire online startup Assurance IQ Inc for $2.35 billion, the Wall Street Journal reported on Thursday, citing executives of the U.S. insurer. Prudential (LON: ) would provide up to $1.15 billion in additional cash and equity if Assurance meets certain growth objectives, the WSJ reported. Prudential and Assurance IQ were not immediately available for comment.

Prudential to buy online startup Assurance IQ for $2.35 billion: WSJ
